A cricket ball is bowled at 0 m/s and reaches 30 m/s in 0.5 s. Acceleration = (30âˆ’0)Ã·0.5 = 60 m/sÂ². When your father brakes the car from 60 km/h to 0 in 5 seconds, the car is decelerating. Lorry drivers on NH highways must manage acceleration carefully to save fuel!
